sentence: june 05, 2019 the federal reserve's review of its monetary policy strategy, tools, and communication practices vice chair richard h. clarida at the conference on monetary policy strategy, tools, and communication practices (a fed listens event), federal reserve bank of chicago, chicago, illinois share watch live good morning, and welcome to day two of the federal reserve system conference on monetary policy strategy, tools, and communication practices.1 i think you will have to agree that the presentations and discussion yesterday were uniformly thoughtful, substantive, and stimulating, and today we will have another impressive lineup of speakers and panelists addressing timely topics that are relevant to our review.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: yesterday professors eberly, stock, and wright provided us with a thorough and thoughtful evaluation of the federal reserve's monetary policy strategy, tools, and communications since 2009.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: they conclude that the policy tools that the federal open market committee (fomc) relied onâ€”"level policy" and "slope policy," to use their terminologyâ€”helped restore the u.s. economy to health and bring it close to the statutory goals of maximum employment and price stability assigned to us by the congress.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: as was noted several times yesterday, in recent years forecasters and policymakers have been surprised by the decline in the unemployment rate and the size of the sustained ongoing gains in payroll employment.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: fomc participants' estimates of the longer-run normal rate of unemployment in the summary of economic projections illustrate this pointâ€”they have drifted lower over time as labor market conditions have improved and inflation has remained quiescent.2 the paper by professors abraham and haltiwanger provided us with an innovative search-and-matching model to estimate labor market slackâ€”which complements the standard estimates based on unemployment gaps and phillips curve relationships.
label: LABEL_2

sentence: professor obstfeld's paper examined the ways that global economic integration affects inflation and the neutral rate of interestâ€”or r*â€”and the role played by the u.s. dollar in transmitting the federal reserve's monetary policy to other countries.
